Game information:

Sharpen your axe, string your bow, brew your potions! Ancaria needs heroes
like you. Grab your friends to join the resistance!

The once peaceful land of Ancaria is in grave danger. The evil Ashen
empire has enslaved its population and is using the orc-like Grimmoc to
wipe out the Seraphim, who swore to protect it. In order to defeat the
empire you will have to prove yourself as a warrior by riding terrifying
mounts, acquiring earth shattering skills and looting powerful weapons and
valuable treasures. Grab your friends and join the resistance!

Features:

* Battle it out with up to 3 player co-op
* Take charge of 1 of 4 unique playable character classes with their own
set of skills
* Explore the vast world of Ancaria
* Ride thumping mounts and use devastating war-machines
* Tons of loot!
* Define your own fighting style with different weapon combinations

Installation Information:

* Burn or mount
* Install
* Play the game
